title: 2 accounts 1 email
body: currently i got 2 accounts on west and they have the same email. and i forgot (let's just call it AA)'s username. so i typed in my email. and i keep getting my other accounts username. pls help my thanks. spend over 200 euro on it.

replies.body:
If you aren't receiving the username you're looking for, it's possible that the account that the username is tied to is no longer associated with your email address. In this case, reaching out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) is the best course of action for recovery.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
